quiz.question: _____ gourmand
quiz.explanation: 美食家，著名的美食家。The noted gourmand wrote reviews for the finest restaurants. 著名的美食家为最好的餐厅撰写评论。

quiz.question: expand ______
quiz.explanation: 扩展，扩展市场。The company plans to expand market share internationally. 公司计划在国际上扩展市场份额。

quiz.question: _________ firebrand
quiz.explanation: 煽动者，政治煽动者。The political firebrand stirred up the crowd with passionate speeches. 政治煽动者用激情的演讲煽动人群。

quiz.question: ___ __ errand
quiz.explanation: 差事，跑差事。She had to run an errand at the post office. 她不得不在邮局跑差事。

quiz.question: ____ __ ___ grandstand
quiz.explanation: 看台，迎合看台观众。The politician would play to the grandstand with dramatic gestures. 政客会用戏剧性的姿态迎合看台观众。

quiz.question: withstand ________
quiz.explanation: 承受，承受压力。The structure was designed to withstand pressure from earthquakes. 该结构旨在承受地震的压力。

quiz.question: bend ___ _____
quiz.explanation: 弯曲，违反规则。Sometimes you have to bend the rules to get things done. 有时你必须违反规则才能把事情办成。

quiz.question: unbend _ ______
quiz.explanation: 放松，稍微放松。He needed to unbend a little and enjoy life. 他需要稍微放松享受生活。

quiz.question: descend ___ ______
quiz.explanation: 下降，下楼梯。Carefully descend the stairs in the dark. 在黑暗中小心下楼梯。

quiz.question: condescend __ ____
quiz.explanation: 屈尊，屈尊帮忙。He wouldn't condescend to help with menial tasks. 他不会屈尊帮忙做琐碎的工作。

quiz.question: transcend ______
quiz.explanation: 超越，超越极限。Great art can transcend limits of time and culture. 伟大的艺术可以超越时间和文化的极限。

quiz.question: reprehend __________
quiz.explanation: 谴责，谴责不当行为。The committee voted to reprehend misconduct by the official. 委员会投票谴责官员的不当行为。

quiz.question: _____ comprehend
quiz.explanation: 理解，完全理解。It took time to fully comprehend the complexity of the issue. 需要时间才能完全理解这个问题的复杂性。

quiz.question: apprehend _ _______
quiz.explanation: 逮捕，逮捕嫌疑人。Police worked to apprehend a suspect in the robbery. 警方努力逮捕抢劫案的嫌疑人。

quiz.question: fiendish ____
quiz.explanation: 恶魔般的，恶魔般的阴谋。The villain devised a fiendish plot. 恶棍设计了恶魔般的阴谋。

quiz.question: mend _ _____
quiz.explanation: 修补，修补篱笆。He spent the afternoon trying to mend a fence. 他花了一下午试图修补篱笆。

quiz.question: amend ___ ____
quiz.explanation: 修改，修改法案。Congress voted to amend the bill before passage. 国会投票在通过前修改法案。

quiz.question: emend _ ____
quiz.explanation: 校订，校订文本。The scholar worked to emend a text from ancient manuscripts. 学者努力从古代手稿中校订文本。

quiz.question: ______ impends
quiz.explanation: 即将发生，危险即将发生。Everyone sensed that danger impends. 每个人都感觉到危险即将发生。

quiz.question: expend _________
quiz.explanation: 花费，花费资源。The project would expend resources over several years. 该项目将在几年内花费资源。

quiz.question: rend _______
quiz.explanation: 撕裂，撕裂成碎片。The conflict threatened to rend asunder the community. 冲突威胁要撕裂成碎片社区。

quiz.question: tend _ ______
quiz.explanation: 照料，照料花园。She would tend a garden every morning. 她每天早上都会照料花园。

quiz.question: pretend _________
quiz.explanation: 假装，假装无知。He would pretend ignorance when questioned. 被质问时他会假装无知。

quiz.question: superintend _____
quiz.explanation: 监督，监督工程。The engineer was hired to superintend works at the site. 工程师被雇来监督现场的工程。

quiz.question: distend _______
quiz.explanation: 膨胀，膨胀胃部。Eating too much can distend stomach uncomfortably. 吃得太多会让胃部不舒服地膨胀。

quiz.question: extend _ ________
quiz.explanation: 延长，延长截止日期。The professor agreed to extend a deadline for the paper. 教授同意延长论文的截止日期。

quiz.question: rescind __ _____
quiz.explanation: 撤销，撤销提议。The company decided to rescind an offer of employment. 公司决定撤销工作提议。

quiz.question: purblind ________
quiz.explanation: 愚钝的，愚钝的判断。His purblind judgment led to poor decisions. 他愚钝的判断导致了糟糕的决定。

quiz.question: grind ______
quiz.explanation: 研磨，研磨咖啡。She would grind coffee beans fresh each morning. 她每天早上都会研磨新鲜的咖啡豆。

quiz.question: _________ vagabond
quiz.explanation: 流浪者，流浪的流浪者。The wandering vagabond had no fixed home. 流浪的流浪者没有固定的家。

quiz.question: abscond ____ _____
quiz.explanation: 潜逃，携款潜逃。The accountant would abscond with funds from the company. 会计会携款潜逃。

quiz.question: almond ____
quiz.explanation: 杏仁，杏仁树。The almond tree blossomed in spring. 杏仁树在春天开花。

quiz.question: ____ frond
quiz.explanation: 叶子，棕榈叶子。The palm frond swayed in the breeze. 棕榈叶子在微风中摇曳。

quiz.question: moribund _______
quiz.explanation: 垂死的，垂死的公司。The moribund company was on the verge of bankruptcy. 垂死的公司濒临破产。

quiz.question: fecund ___________
quiz.explanation: 富饶的，富饶的想象力。The writer had a fecund imagination that produced countless stories. 作家有富饶的想象力创作了无数故事。

quiz.question: rubicund ____
quiz.explanation: 红润的，红润的脸。The jolly man had a rubicund face. 快活的男人有红润的脸。

quiz.question: jocund ____
quiz.explanation: 欢乐的，欢乐的心情。He was in a jocund mood at the party. 他在派对上心情欢乐的心情。

quiz.question: hidebound _______
quiz.explanation: 顽固的，顽固的思维。His hidebound mindset prevented innovation. 他顽固的思维阻止了创新。

quiz.question: confound ____________
quiz.explanation: 使困惑，使预期困惑。The results would confound expectations of the experts. 结果会使专家的预期困惑。

quiz.question: profound _______
quiz.explanation: 深刻的，深刻的见解。The philosopher offered profound insight into human nature. 哲学家对人性提供了深刻的见解。

quiz.question: ________ compound
quiz.explanation: 化合物，化学化合物。The laboratory analyzed the chemical compound. 实验室分析了化学化合物。

quiz.question: unsound _________
quiz.explanation: 不健全的，不健全的推理。His argument was based on unsound reasoning. 他的论点基于不健全的推理。

quiz.question: rotund ______
quiz.explanation: 圆胖的，圆胖的身材。The rotund figure of the chef was recognizable. 厨师圆胖的身材很容易辨认。

quiz.question: orotund _____
quiz.explanation: 洪亮的，洪亮的声音。The speaker had an orotund voice that filled the hall. 演讲者有洪亮的声音充满了大厅。

quiz.question: slipshod ____
quiz.explanation: 马虎的，马虎的工作。The contractor's slipshod work needed redoing. 承包商马虎的工作需要重做。

quiz.question: plod _____
quiz.explanation: 沉重地走，沉重地走。The tired workers would plod along the muddy road. 疲惫的工人会在泥泞的路上沉重地走。

quiz.question: ______ falsehood
quiz.explanation: 谎言，传播谎言。The malicious person would spread falsehood about others. 恶意的人会传播关于他人的谎言。

quiz.question: ____ hardihood
quiz.explanation: 大胆，显示大胆。The explorers would show hardihood in facing dangers. 探险者会在面对危险时显示大胆。

quiz.question: ___ pod
quiz.explanation: 豆荚，豌豆豆荚。The pea pod contained several seeds. 豌豆豆荚里有几颗种子。

quiz.question: prod ____ ______
quiz.explanation: 刺激，刺激采取行动。The crisis would prod into action the government. 危机会刺激政府采取行动。

quiz.question: sod ____
quiz.explanation: 草皮，草皮农场。The sod farm supplied turf for lawns. 草皮农场为草坪供应草皮。

quiz.question: _________ bard
quiz.explanation: 吟游诗人，流浪的吟游诗人。The wandering bard sang tales of heroes. 流浪的吟游诗人唱英雄的故事。

quiz.question: discard _____
quiz.explanation: 丢弃，丢弃垃圾。Please discard trash in the proper bin. 请在适当的垃圾箱中丢弃垃圾。

quiz.question: ______ disregard
quiz.explanation: 漠视，漫不经心的漠视。His blithe disregard for rules caused problems. 他对规则漫不经心的漠视造成了问题。

quiz.question: haggard ____
quiz.explanation: 憔悴的，憔悴的脸。After days without sleep, she had a haggard face. 几天没睡后，她有憔悴的脸。

quiz.question: laggard _______
quiz.explanation: 落后的，落后的经济。The laggard economy needed stimulus measures. 落后的经济需要刺激措施。

quiz.question: ______ niggard
quiz.explanation: 吝啬鬼，吝啬的吝啬鬼。The stingy niggard refused to donate anything. 吝啬的吝啬鬼拒绝捐赠任何东西。

quiz.question: ____ sluggard
quiz.explanation: 懒汉，懒惰的懒汉。The lazy sluggard avoided all work. 懒惰的懒汉逃避所有工作。

quiz.question: diehard ___
quiz.explanation: 死忠，死忠粉丝。He was a diehard fan who never missed a game. 他是从不错过比赛的死忠粉丝。

quiz.question: ________ blowhard
quiz.explanation: 吹牛者，自夸的吹牛者。The boastful blowhard exaggerated his achievements. 自夸的吹牛者夸大了他的成就。

quiz.question: _____ dullard
quiz.explanation: 笨蛋，完全的笨蛋。He was considered an utter dullard by his classmates. 他被同学认为是完全的笨蛋。

quiz.question: ______ _ canard
quiz.explanation: 谣言，传播谣言。The tabloid would spread a canard about the celebrity. 小报会传播关于名人的谣言。

quiz.question: aboveboard ____
quiz.explanation: 光明正大的，光明正大的交易。The business conducted an aboveboard deal. 企业进行了光明正大的交易。

quiz.question: hoard ____
quiz.explanation: 囤积，囤积现金。Some people hoard cash during economic uncertainty. 有些人在经济不确定时期囤积现金。

quiz.question: retard ______
quiz.explanation: 阻碍，阻碍增长。Poor soil conditions can retard growth of plants. 土壤条件差会阻碍植物的增长。

quiz.question: ________ dastard
quiz.explanation: 懦夫，懦弱的懦夫。The cowardly dastard fled from battle. 懦弱的懦夫从战场逃跑了。

quiz.question: safeguard _______
quiz.explanation: 保护，保护隐私。New laws aim to safeguard privacy online. 新法律旨在保护网上隐私。

quiz.question: leeward ____
quiz.explanation: 背风的，背风的一侧。The sailors anchored on the leeward side of the island. 水手们在岛屿的背风的一侧下锚。

quiz.question: untoward ________
quiz.explanation: 不幸的，不幸的事件。An untoward incident marred the celebration. 不幸的事件破坏了庆祝活动。

quiz.question: straightforward ______
quiz.explanation: 直截了当的，直截了当的回答。She gave a straightforward answer to the question. 她对问题给出了直截了当的回答。

quiz.question: _________ hazard
quiz.explanation: 危险，工作场所危险。Unsafe equipment is a workplace hazard. 不安全的设备是工作场所危险。

quiz.question: haphazard ________
quiz.explanation: 随意的，随意的方法。His haphazard approach led to poor results. 他随意的方法导致了糟糕的结果。

quiz.question: _ herd __ ______
quiz.explanation: 群，一群牛。A herd of cattle grazed in the pasture. 一群牛在牧场上吃草。

quiz.question: undergird _________
quiz.explanation: 支撑，支撑论点。Strong evidence should undergird arguments. 强有力的证据应该支撑论点。

quiz.question: _____ cord
quiz.explanation: 电线，电源线。The power cord was too short to reach the outlet. 电源线太短无法够到插座。

quiz.question: _____ accord
quiz.explanation: 协议，达成协议。The negotiators worked to reach accord. 谈判者努力达成协议。

quiz.question: ________ concord
quiz.explanation: 和谐，国家和谐。The treaty promoted national concord. 该条约促进了国家和谐。

quiz.question: ford ___ _____
quiz.explanation: 涉水而过，涉水过河。The travelers had to ford the river on horseback. 旅行者不得不骑马涉水过河。

quiz.question: ______ chord
quiz.explanation: 和弦，吉他和弦。The musician strummed a guitar chord. 音乐家弹奏了吉他和弦。

quiz.question: ____ harpsichord
quiz.explanation: 大键琴，演奏大键琴。The baroque musician would play harpsichord. 巴洛克音乐家会演奏大键琴。

quiz.question: ____ foreword
quiz.explanation: 前言，书的前言。A famous author wrote the book foreword. 一位著名作家写了书的前言。

quiz.question: curd ______
quiz.explanation: 凝乳，凝乳奶酪。Curd cheese is used in many recipes. 凝乳奶酪用于许多食谱。

quiz.question: defraud _________
quiz.explanation: 欺诈，欺诈投资者。The scheme aimed to defraud investors of millions. 该计划旨在欺诈投资者数百万。

quiz.question: ______ feud
quiz.explanation: 世仇，家族世仇。The family feud lasted for generations. 家族世仇持续了几代人。

quiz.question: _______ astrolabe
quiz.explanation: 星盘，古代星盘。Sailors used an ancient astrolabe for navigation. 水手们使用古代星盘进行导航。

quiz.question: imbibe _______
quiz.explanation: 吸收，吸收文化。Living abroad allowed her to imbibe culture deeply. 在国外生活让她深入吸收文化。

quiz.question: _____ gibe
quiz.explanation: 嘲讽，互相嘲讽。The rivals would trade gibe during debates. 对手会在辩论中互相嘲讽。

quiz.question: jibe ____ _____
quiz.explanation: 一致，与事实一致。His story didn't jibe with facts. 他的故事与事实不一致。

quiz.question: _____ _ bribe
quiz.explanation: 贿赂，提供贿赂。It is illegal to offer a bribe to officials. 向官员提供贿赂是非法的。

quiz.question: ascribe __
quiz.explanation: 归因于，归因于。We can ascribe to his success to hard work. 我们可以将他的成功归因于努力工作。

quiz.question: circumscribe ______
quiz.explanation: 限制，限制权力。The constitution seeks to circumscribe powers of government. 宪法试图限制政府的权力。

quiz.question: transcribe _____
quiz.explanation: 抄写，抄写笔记。The assistant would transcribe notes from the meeting. 助理会抄写会议的笔记。

quiz.question: inscribe _ ____
quiz.explanation: 刻写，刻写名字。They would inscribe a name on the memorial. 他们会在纪念碑上刻写名字。

quiz.question: proscribe _ ________
quiz.explanation: 禁止，禁止做法。The law would proscribe a practice deemed harmful. 法律会禁止被认为有害的做法。

quiz.question: adobe _____
quiz.explanation: 土坯，土坯房子。The adobe house kept cool in the desert heat. 土坯房子在沙漠炎热中保持凉爽。

quiz.question: ________ lobe
quiz.explanation: 叶，颞叶。The temporal lobe processes auditory information. 颞叶处理听觉信息。

quiz.question: _______ microbe
quiz.explanation: 微生物，有害的微生物。Harmful microbe can cause disease. 有害的微生物会导致疾病。

quiz.question: _____-__ wardrobe
quiz.explanation: 衣柜，嵌入式衣柜。The bedroom featured a built-in wardrobe. 卧室有嵌入式衣柜。

quiz.question: _____ probe
quiz.explanation: 探测器，太空探测器。The space probe sent back images from Mars. 太空探测器从火星发回图像。

quiz.question: deface ________
quiz.explanation: 损坏，损坏财产。It is a crime to deface property with graffiti. 用涂鸦损坏财产是犯罪。
